Reference

Derivations

Derivations add one ore more variables or parameters to the input dataset and return the extended dataset.

derive_agegr_fda() derive_agegr_ema()

Derive Age Groups

derive_baseline()

Derive Baseline

derive_derived_param()

Adds a Parameter Computed from the Analysis Value of Other Parameters

derive_disposition_dt()

Derive a Disposition Date

derive_disposition_reason()

Derive a Disposition Reason at a Specific Timepoint

derive_disposition_status()

Derive a Disposition Status at a Specific Timepoint

derive_extreme_flag()

Add a Variable Flagging the First or Last Observation Within Each By Group

derive_last_dose()

Derive Last Dose Date(-time)

derive_obs_number()

Adds a Variable Numbering the Observations Within Each By Group

derive_param_bmi()

Adds a Parameter for BMI

derive_param_bsa()

Adds a parameter for BSA (Body Surface Area) using the specified method

derive_param_doseint()

Adds a Parameter for Dose Intensity

derive_param_map()

Adds a Parameter for Mean Arterial Pressure

derive_param_qtc()

Adds a Parameter for Corrected QT

derive_param_rr()

Adds a parameter for derived RR

derive_param_tte()

Derive a Time-to-Event Parameter

derive_params_exposure()

Add an Aggregated Parameter and Derive the Associated Start and End Dates

derive_summary_records()

Add New Records Within By Groups Using Aggregation Functions

derive_var_ady()

Derive Analysis Study Day

derive_var_aendy()

Derive Analysis End Relative Day

derive_var_age_years()

Derive Age in Years

derive_var_anrind()

Derive Reference Range Indicator

derive_var_astdy()

Derive Analysis Start Relative Day

derive_var_atirel()

Derive Time Relative to Reference

derive_var_base()

Derive BASE Variable

derive_var_basec()

Derive BASEC Variable

derive_var_basetype()

Derive BASETYPE Variable

derive_var_chg()

Derive Change from Baseline

derive_var_dthcaus()

Derive Death Cause

derive_var_lstalvdt()

Derive Last Known Alive Date

derive_var_ontrtfl()

Derive On-Treatment Flag Variable

derive_var_pchg()

Derive Percent Change from Baseline

derive_var_trtdurd()

Derive Total Treatment Duration (Days)

derive_var_trtedtm()

Derive Datetime of Last Exposure to Treatment

derive_var_trtsdtm()

Derive Datetime of First Exposure to Treatment

derive_vars_aage()

Derive Analysis Age

derive_vars_atc()

Derive ATC Class Variables

derive_vars_dt()

Derive/Impute a Date from a Date Character Vector

derive_vars_dtm()

Derive/Impute a Datetime from a Date Character Vector

derive_vars_dtm_to_dt()

Derive Date Variables from Datetime Variables

derive_vars_dtm_to_tm()

Derive Time Variables from Datetime Variables

derive_vars_duration()

Derive Duration

derive_vars_query()

Derive Query Variables

derive_vars_suppqual()

Join Supplementary Qualifier Variables into the Parent SDTM Domain

derive_vars_transposed()

Derive Variables by Transposing and Merging a Second Dataset

derive_worst_flag()

Adds a Variable Flagging the maximal / minimal value within a group of observations

Computations

Computations expect vectors as input and return a vector

compute_bmi()

Compute Body Mass Index (BMI)

compute_bsa()

Compute Body Surface Area (BSA)

compute_dtf()

Derive the Date Imputation Flag

compute_duration()

Derive Duration

compute_map()

Compute Mean Arterial Pressure (MAP)

compute_qtc()

Compute Corrected QT

compute_rr()

Compute RR Interval From Heart Rate

compute_tmf()

Derive the Time Imputation Flag

convert_dtc_to_dt()

Convert a Date Character Vector into a Date Object

convert_dtc_to_dtm()

Convert a Date Character Vector into a Datetime Object

format_eoxxstt_default()

Default Format for Disposition Status

format_reason_default()

Default format for the disposition reason

impute_dtc()

Impute Partial Date(-time) Portion of a '--DTC' Variable

CDISC Hierarchy

ADaM

General functions which can be used for any ADaM dataset

compute_bmi()

Compute Body Mass Index (BMI)

compute_bsa()

Compute Body Surface Area (BSA)

Derive Duration

derive_vars_transposed()

Derive Variables by Transposing and Merging a Second Dataset

derive_worst_flag()

Adds a Variable Flagging the maximal / minimal value within a group of observations

filter_extreme()

Filter the First or Last Observation for Each By Group

Source Specifications

Classes defining sources for derivations where variables or observations from more than one dataset are considered, e.g., like in derive_var_lstalvdt()

censor_source()

Create a censor_source Object

dthcaus_source()

Create an dthcaus_source object

event_source()

Create an event_source Object

lstalvdt_source()

Create an lstalvdt_source object

params()

Create a Set of Parameters

Pre-Defined Time-to-Event Sources

tte_source objects defined by {admiral} that can be used as input for derive_param_tte()

death_event lastalive_censor ae_event ae_ser_event ae_gr1_event ae_gr2_event ae_gr3_event ae_gr4_event ae_gr5_event ae_gr35_event ae_sev_event ae_wd_event

Pre-Defined Time-to-Event Source Objects

ADaM Datasets

adae

Adverse Event Analysis Dataset

adcm

Concomitant Medication Analysis Dataset

adsl

Subject Level Analysis Dataset

advs

Vital Signs Analysis Dataset

adex

Exposure Analysis Dataset

Developer Utilities

Assertions

assert_character_scalar()

Is an Argument a Character Scalar (String)?

assert_character_vector()

Is an Argument a Character Vector?

assert_data_frame()

Is an Argument a Data Frame?

assert_filter_cond()

Is an Argument a Filter Condition?

assert_has_variables()

Does a Dataset Contain All Required Variables?

assert_integer_scalar()

Is an Argument an Integer Scalar?

assert_list_element()

Is an Element of a List of Lists/Classes Fulfilling a Condition?

assert_list_of()

Is an Argument a List of Objects of a Specific S3 Class?

assert_logical_scalar()

Is an Argument a Logical Scalar (Boolean)?

assert_numeric_vector()

Is an Argument a Numeric Vector?

assert_one_to_one()

Is There a One to One Mapping between Variables?

assert_order_vars()

Is an Argument a List of Order Variables?

assert_param_does_not_exist()

Asserts That a Parameter Does not Exist in the Dataset

assert_s3_class()

Is an Argument an Object of a Specific S3 Class?

assert_symbol()

Is an Argument a Symbol?

assert_unit()

Asserts That a Parameter is Provided in the Expected Unit

assert_valid_queries()

Verify if a dataset has the required format as queries dataset.

assert_vars()

Is an Argument a List of Variables?

assert_varval_list()

Is an Argument a Variable-Value List?

Checks

is_date()

is_timeunit()

Is Time Unit?

is_valid_hour()

is_valid_sec_min()

Check Validity of the Minute/Second Portion of the Time Input

Various

Helper function to convert date (or date-time) objects to characters of dtc format (-DTC type of variable)

enumerate()

expect_dfs_equal()

extend_source_datasets()
